Detailed Description

Enumeration Type Documentation

enum wxExStatusFlags

Flags for wxExLogStatus.

Enumerator:
STAT_DEFAULT 

shows 'modified' and file 'fullname'

STAT_SYNC 

shows 'synchronized' instead of 'modified'

STAT_FULLPATH 

shows file 'fullpath' instead of 'fullname'

Function Documentation

const wxString wxExAlignText ( const wxString &  lines,
const wxString &  header,
bool  fill_out_with_space = false,
bool  fill_out = false,
const wxExLexer &  lexer = wxExLexer() 
)

Aligns text.

Parameters:
lineslines to align
headerThe header is used as a prefix for the line, directly followed by the lines, and if necessary on the next line the header is repeated as a string of spaces.
fill_out_with_spaceif fill out, then use space
fill_outfill out
lexerif lexer is specified fills out over lexer comment lines If the lexer has no comment end character, fill out with spaces is not done.
const wxString wxExEllipsed ( const wxString &  text,
const wxString &  control = wxEmptyString 
)

Adds an ellipses after text.

The control, if present is postfixed, after a tab character (for accels).

bool wxExFindOtherFileName ( const wxFileName &  filename,
wxFileName *  lastfile 
)

Finds other filenames from the one specified in the same dir structure.

Results are put on the lastfile argument.

const wxString wxExGetEndOfText ( const wxString &  text,
size_t  max_chars = 15 
)

If text length exceeds max_chars, returns an ellipse prefix followed by the last max_chars from the text, otherwise just returns the text.

int wxExGetIconID ( const wxFileName &  filename)

Gets the icon index for this filename (uses the file extension to get it).

The return value is an index in wxTheFileIconsTable. You can use this index as a bitmap using: wxTheFileIconsTable->GetSmallImageList()->GetBitmap(wxExGetIconID(file))

bool wxExMatchesOneOf ( const wxFileName &  filename,
const wxString &  patterns 
)

Returns true if filename (fullname) matches one of the fields in specified pattern (fields separated by ; sign).

const wxArrayString &  files,
long  file_flags = 0,
int  dir_flags = wxDIR_DEFAULT 
)

Opens files.

Opens all files specified by files.

Parameters:
frameframe on which OpenFile for each file is called, and wxExDirOpenFile for each dir
filesarray with files
file_flagsflags to be used with OpenFile
dir_flagsflags to be used with wxExDirOpenFile

long  style = wxFD_OPEN|wxFD_MULTIPLE|wxFD_CHANGE_DIR,

Shows a dialog and opens selected files (calls wxExOpenFiles).

frameframe
stylestyle for wxExFileDialog dialog
wildcardswilcards for wxExFileDialog dialog
ask_for_continueflags to be used with wxExFileDialog
file_flagsflags to be used with OpenFile
dir_flagsflags to be used with wxExDirOpenFile

Use specified VCS command to set lexer on STC document.

Parameters:
commandVCS command, used to check for diff or open command

int  id,

Executes VCS command id for specified files and opens component if necessary.

Parameters:
frameframe on which OpenFile is called
idVCS menu id to execute
